name: Google Maps - Clean Printer Friendly Pages
description: Hides legal notice, google maps logo, and "save trees, go green" image from google maps print friendly pages..
obsoletion_message: Google switched to un-editable PDF format for printing. Bummer!
additional_info:
/* +++ changelog +++
May 16th, 2012
- hides logo again: "logo-img-2"
April 2, 2012
- fixed "include large map" flashing issue
December 14, 2009
- hides "Directions weren't right" in footer
- re-hides google logo
Oct 15, 2008
- original release
*/

discussions.name: Works well for the few times I've used this.
